text: [Applause]
[Music]
hello I'm Arnav a cloud of FO engineer
here at the ews office in Cape Town
today I'm going to show you how to
resolve an authorization error when
attempting to view or modify across
account Amazon simple Q Services
subscription attribute
using the Amazon simple notification
service console let's get started note
that subscription related permissions to
view and edit can be included in SNS
topic policy actions first let's look at
resolving the situation through the AWS
Management console open the Amazon SNS
console in the account that owns the SNS
Topic in the navigation pane choose
topics choose the name of the topic then
from the subscription tab copy the
subscription ID of the Amazon sqs Q
subscription open the Amazon SNS console
in the account that owns the
sqsq on the subscriptions menu option
choose the subscription ID that you just
copied View and edit the subscription
attributes as
needed now let's look at resolving the
issue using the ews command line
interface run this ews command that uses
the list subscriptions by topic API to
fetch the subscrip description
Arn in the account that owns the queue
run this AWS CLI command that uses the
get subscription attributes API using
subscription Arn from the earlier step
as a request parameter to fetch the
subscription
attributes finally if you want the AWS
account that owns the SNS topic to
control the SNS topic subscriptions
attributes you can delete the existing
subscription and then create the same
subscription from the account that owns
the SNS topic the AWS account that owns
the SNS topic is now the owner of the
created subscription
resource so now you know how to resolve
an authorization error when attempting
to view or modify across a account sqs
subscriptions attributes using the SNS
console thanks for watching and happy
cloud computing from all of us here at
AWS
[Applause]
[Music]
